title: Goodbye Everybody
content:
I know I was never around here much, but Id just thought Id let everyone know that Im retiring from keen modding and the Commander keen community. Its been fun, discussing keen and getting to know several of you personally, and I honestly never thought that my time to leave would ever come. But it has, so its goodbye.

Before I leave however, Id like to get all my unfinished Keen projects and miscellaneous Keen art out for others to use. If someone could host the file for me, just contact me on msn and Ill send it on over and get it posted in this topic.

title: Re: Goodbye Everybody
content:
Well, what's this, then? Retiring from modding?
Well... How about you still stop by PCKF every once in a while then?

If not, well... See ya. It was nice having you around and playing your awesome mods.

(Gee, it's been a while since someone left, isn't it?)____________
Don't think of me as an ordinary man.

Even though I am an ordinary man.

Ah, [url=http://DaVince.sitesled.com/]site.[/url]

title: Re: Goodbye Everybody
content:
Wow, I didn't seriously see this one coming! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] Too bad, dude... Why is this? Although I can guess, modding takes a lot time and energy and you don't have it currently, not being a kid anymore with all the time in the world (just like me).

Anyways, your work won't be forgotten easily, awesome mods and plenty of them! Great work! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

Good luck, and farewell. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-yorp.gif[/img] 3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: Goodbye Everybody
content:
aww man to bad you are gonna leave
you could ask grafix for an CKFS acount to upload your stuff[url=http://profile.xfire.com/memsys][img]http://miniprofile.xfire.com/bg/bg/type/2/memsys.png[/img][/url]

title: Re: Goodbye Everybody
content:
Its really a combination of lack of time and loss of interest.

Ill probably come back from time to time just to check for new mods, specifically some Ive been waiting for (Spleen, Im looking at monkey business), but Im no longer going to be working on any projects of my own nor will I be around the forum here (not that I ever was).

Courtesy of Keenrush, heres all my unfinished projects and graphics. Feel free to use these in whichever way you want.

[url=http://www.keengrid.net/ckfiles/Ceilick's%20Keen%20Art.zip]www.keengrid.net/ckfiles/...%20Art.zip[/url]

title: son of a...
content:
Dangit, Ceilick, you were a damn good modder. I'm sad to see you go. *helmet over chest, moment of silence*

...See you around.

title: Re: son of a...
content:
This astounds me, it really does, I'm saddened.

See you old friend.Szevvy Forever!
And Spleen never!

title: Re: Goodbye Everybody
content:
Does anyone have the Keen 6 1.4 Exe? I've tried the patchers on Dosclassics, but they're useless in every way.[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v499/Nevad/menbun.gif[/img]

Awww! Feel the love!

title: Re: Goodbye Everybody
content:
Just now I was playing your Keen 4 mod for the first time.

Holy good gravy. This is the most AWESOME thing I've played in quite a long while. A bit too visually 'dark' for my tastes, but still...you deserve a trophy. I am sure that whatever your next non-Keen-related project turns out to be, it will be as awesome.

Godspeed!

title: Re: Goodbye Everybody
content:
Bah, I'm already regretting having decided to leave [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-rolleyes.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

I really am done with all my keen projects, but I don't really want to abandon keen all together, at least not yet.

So I guess this is only goodbye to my projects, not me [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smoke2.gif[/img]

title: Re: Goodbye Everybody
content:
One cannot abandon Keen. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-rasta.gif[/img]

Seriously, though, you produced some of the best mods I've played. Keys of Krodacia deserves to be Episode 7 more than anything else that has claimed to be. Wii will miss you! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] [img]http://i91.photobucket.com/albums/k284/KeegTech/WarholDopefishPNG2.png[/img]

title: Re: Goodbye Everybody
content:
This is extremely, extremely bad news for me. After passing the Keys of Krodacia I was only waiting for the unofficial Keen 8! Can you please read my post in release topic about my thoughts after playing CK7?
Please think about this and remember that such decisions are fully reversible! If you will have some time, please think about some Keen projects!
Have a nice day ceilick [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

title: Ceilick Lives
content:
Farewell for now, if you decide to disappear from the forums entirely. You'll be back!

Just make sure you keep (and backup!) your WIP stuff, in case you rediscover your interest sometime down the track.

I wish you luck with your IRL adventures. This community has benefited greatly from your contributions.

I'll keep you posted when Monky Business is ready!

Edit: I find it amusing there posts 'Hello everyone' and 'Goodbye everybody' have appeared in the same time frame. Sounds like those 'Moving' posts from last year...

title: Re: Ceilick Lives
content:
Aye, one of the most productive users about the quit his projects. This is really a sad moment for the community.-----------------
